name: Run Little Mouse!
description:
Although the theme was "the end is a new beginning", we didn't have enough game dev experience to make a mechanic we thought about time traveling with the rat, but it ended up becoming a cool plataformer of a rat which is trying to escape a lab from experiments. It was a fun and challenging process, which we learned a lot about doing it and we hope you can have a short and nice experience of the game!

Credits:

Wilson Xavier

Andrey Ribeiro

Guilherme
